description:
Its a movie that's been trapped in development hell for half a decade, that's been through six different writers and two directors, and a few days ago, Marvel seemed to finally pull the plug on Blade by confirming its been delayed indefinitely. 

Get your new Critical Drinker plush here: https://www.makeship.com/products/the-critical-drinker-2-0-plushie
title: Marvel's Blade Is Toast (And That's A Good Thing)
